(:action heat ; General action to process resources or obtain necessities
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - resource ?location - place ?source - source)
    :precondition (and
      (at ?agent ?location)
      (at ?resource ?location)
      (at ?source ?location)
      (not (processed ?resource))
    )
    :effect (and
      (processed ?resource)
      (available ?agent)
    )

(:action hunt
  ; Hunt for resources, test them, and ensure they are safe for consumption
  :parameters (?person - person ?location - place ?resource - object ?food - food)
  
  :precondition (and
    (at ?person ?location)
    (not (captured ?resource))
    (not (tested ?food))
    (has ?person ?resource)
  )
  
  :effect (and
    (captured ?resource)
    (has ?person ?resource)
    (tested ?food)
    (if (poisonous ?food) (alert ?person))
